name: ClarityUI.CDN

values.name: icons
values.comment: Adds a link to an [unpkg](https://unpkg.com/#/) mirror of the clarify-icons css

values.name: iconsJS
values.comment: Adds a script to an unpkg](<https://unpkg.com/#/>) mirror of the clarify-icons js

values.name: styles
values.comment:
Adds a link to an [unpkg](https://unpkg.com/#/) mirror of the clarify-ui css

    import ClarityUI.CDN

    view : Model -> Html Msg
    view model =
        div []
            [ CDN.styles -- css embedded inline
            ]

name: ClarityUI.Alert

aliases.name: AlertItem
aliases.comment: Item to pass to an alert

types.name: AlertType
types.comment: Alert Type. Either Danger, Warning, Info or Success

values.name: alert
values.comment:
Main Alert Entry Point. Creates a clarity alert.

Documentation about Clarity Alerts: <https://vmware.github.io/clarity/documentation/alerts#top>
values.type: ClarityUI.Alert.AlertType -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> ClarityUI.Alert.AlertItem -> Html.Html msg

values.name: alertAppDanger
values.comment:
Alert App Danger.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible danger app alert.

values.name: alertAppInfo
values.comment:
Alert App Info.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Info app alert.

values.name: alertAppSuccess
values.comment:
Alert App Success.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Success app alert.

values.name: alertAppWarning
values.comment:
Alert App Warning.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible warning app alert.

values.name: alertDanger
values.comment:
Alert Danger.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible danger alert.

values.name: alertInfo
values.comment:
Alert Info.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Info alert.

values.name: alertSuccess
